-Did the offseason recruitment go along the way it was originally planned?
“Crazy, Haru and Teddy were recruited by contacting the team they belonged in before the offseason market opened up. On the 20th of November, when players gained FA status, we brought in Khan and Clid. And finally, Mata joined.
The players were very willing to join which was surprising. One player even came in despite getting less salary than the one he originally wanted. Of course, good treatment of players is important, but some of the players had the desire to win at all cost while being paid less money.”

-Last season, the team had underperformed greatly
“Teddy wanted to play with Faker. And with only Faker, it was difficult to secure a World Championship win. Rebuilding was already foreshadowed. We met with Teddy 3 times. We told him ‘SKT T1 will bet their honor and prestige and win no matter what’ in order to convince him. For Teddy, it wouldn’t have been an easy decision to make.
SKT T1 is a team that has its own tradition and values. We really wanted to continue with Head Coach Kkoma and Faker. We have own treatment from our gaming division, and we have expressed our will. As a whole, it would have bought the players’ sympathy.”

-Last year, however, the size of investment as a whole was evaluated to be lacking. Was this due to belief in the players at the time?
“I can’t agree with the statement that there was no investment. Currently, Faker is the most paid pro player in all of Korea. Bang and Wolf were also given 2 to 3 times the amount usual players in their roles get. Much of the investment went into salary.
Last year, when we re-signed with the players, there was a significant increase in salary. It was unfortunate that it did not lead to good results. This is my own speculation, but out of all the professional gaming organizations in the world, I am sure our investment would be comparable to RNG’s own.

RNG（LOL）教練組相關信息的進展通報 很抱歉讓各位粉絲久等了，我們深知大家非常關心新賽季RNG教練組的招募進程，在前主教 練Heart離開後，俱樂部在各賽區積極尋找新教練成員加入，截止今天我們還未全部完成此 項工作，但我們也取得了一些新進展，在此通報給大家： RNG-Kezman（孫大永）將繼續擔任戰隊總教練一職繼續征戰，但由於孫大永總教練身體抱 恙，目前正在接受治療，衷心祝願孫大永教練能夠早日恢復健康，回歸團隊工作，帶領教 練組共同迎接新賽季的挑戰。 經初步試訓後，原MAD戰隊教練Greentea（蔡尚精）現已加入教練組成為戰術教練，感謝 AHQ電子競技俱樂部早期對於Greentea教練的栽培，同時也感謝MAD戰隊的轉讓！近期他將 暫替孫大永教練，為隊伍完成BP工作。 我們也正在積極接洽各賽區優秀教練人選，努力引入相關人才充實RNG教練組。由於部分人 員尚需進一步溝通確認，2019年RNG戰隊春季賽大名單將在12月30日前公佈。 如有新進展我們會在第一時間通報給大家，非常感謝粉絲們的關心與支持，再次為大家的 等待誠摯致歉！

MAD GG LMS GG
